item.description: This is soo much fun! Free Buffet for first hour, then Free Comedy from 8-10 with a line up of the area's best Comedians! They will be competing for a chance to perform at Kowloon's Komedy Shows, so it is very exciting! Bar menu( food & drinks) available during the show. This will be every Wednesday and I am hosting the show!

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: FREE COMEDY! FREE BUFFET!
